00031   TilesProduction(int SIPM, int TileSize, int Module, int Chip, int Chan) {
00032 
00033     //Set the integer values
00034     obj()->setIntVal(0, TileSize);
00035     obj()->setIntVal(1, SIPM);
00036     obj()->setIntVal(2, Module);
00037     obj()->setIntVal(3, Chip);
00038     obj()->setIntVal(4, Chan);
00039     _hti = HcalTileIndex( Module, Chip, Chan );
00040   }
00041 
00044   TilesProduction(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<NPIINT,NPIFLO,NPIDBL>(obj) { 
00045     _hti = HcalTileIndex( getModule(), getChip(), getChan() );
00046   } 
00047 
00049   virtual ~TilesProduction      () { /* no op*/  }
00050 
00053   int getTileSize() { return obj()->getIntVal(0); } 
00054   int getSIPMID() { return obj()->getIntVal(1); } 
00055   int getModule() { return obj()->getIntVal(2); } 
00056   int getChip() { return obj()->getIntVal(3); } 
00057   int getChan() { return obj()->getIntVal(4); } 
00058 
00059   int getHardwareID(){ return _hti.getIndex(); }
00060 
00063   void print(  std::ostream& os) ;
00064   
00065   // -------- need to implement abstract methods from LCGenericObject
00066   const std::string getTypeName() const { 
00067     return "SiPM_MappingHcal";
00068   } 
00069

00071     return "i:TileSize,i:SiPM,i:Module,i:Chip,i:Chan";
